mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Yeager, David
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Buckstown, Summerset Co. PA [Buckstown, Somerset County, Pennsylvania]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Yeager, David Patient Age: 38. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot wound left hand 2nd finger amputated near New Market VA. Location Wounded: In action near New Market, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/05/15. Nature of Wound: Round ball. Treatment: Description list by Dr. Ford. Result: Cured and returned to duty.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Yeager, David
Gun shot wound left hand 2nd finger amputated near New Market VA
Corporal
